post:
All you need to do is find the "Oulee Bear" on Oulee Hosting's pages. Once you find it, all you need to do is click on it. Fill-in the details on the raffle form then you're included in the raffle already. One (1) raffle entry per account only. You'll be notified thru pm/e-mail.

Promo runs until April 30.

So what are you waiting for? Find the Oulee Bear now.
